long_description: From creeking to river running to playboating, the Werner Powerhouse kayak paddle is the perfect choice for whitewater enthusiasts. Whitewater-grade fiberglass shafts stand up to the toughest situations the river brings your way. Handcrafted, pressure-molded fiberglass blades offer a great balance of weight and durability. Full-sized blades offer palpable bit while maintaining a smooth and stable stroke, even in turbulent water. As you run a rapid, the brilliant red, translucent blades offer great visibility to your upstream paddling partners. Durable snap-button system offers a feathering angle of 0deg to 45deg right hand control. The Werner Powerhouse kayak paddle is handcrafted in Sultan, Washington.
short_description: From creeking to river running to playboating, the Werner Powerhouse kayak paddle is the perfect choice for whitewater enthusiasts.
